title: Commending Drs. Tibor and Galina Gershkovich, Guests of Honor at the 59th Anniversary Banquet of the Flatbush Park Jewish Center on March 27, 2011
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending Drs. Tibor and Galina Gershkovich upon
the  occasion  of their designation as Guests of Honor at the 59th Anni-
versary Banquet of the Flatbush Park Jewish Center on March 27, 2011

WHEREAS, The quality and character of life in the Empire State is great-
ly enriched by the faithful and generous service  of  those  who  devote
themselves to endeavors of family, faith and community; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and
commend individuals of such magnanimous conduct and bearing  who  demon-
strate  a  deep  and  continuing  concern  for  others, and in so doing,
inspire others to do the same; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern and fully in accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  it  is  the  intent  of  this Legislative Body to
commend Drs. Tibor and Galina Gershkovich upon  the  occasion  of  their
designation  as  Guests  of Honor at the 59th Anniversary Banquet of the
Flatbush Park Jewish Center, to be held at Kings Terrace in Brooklyn  on
Sunday, March 27, 2011; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Flatbush Park Jewish Center has grown from a storefront
congregation of 45 families to become one of  New  York  City's  leading
Orthodox  congregations;  it  has  evolved  into a true center of Jewish
communal life, serving the religious, educational and  social  needs  of
the young and old of Brooklyn's Mill Basin community; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  the course of their service to the Flatbush Park
Jewish Center and their community, Drs.  Tibor  and  Galina  Gershkovich
have  exhibited uncommon valor and wisdom; their involvement and leader-
ship have been characterized by an impressive commitment,  an  unbridled
enthusiasm,  and  an  uncompromising standard of excellence in all their
endeavors; and
  WHEREAS, Drs. Tibor  and  Galina  Gershkovich  are  sincerely  devoted
members  and leaders of the Flatbush Park Jewish Center and their commu-
nity as well as generous supporters of the Torah and Youth programs  and
many  other  worthy programs and causes at the Center, in the community,
and in Israel; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is proud to extend its highest  commen-
dation  to  Drs.  Tibor  and Galina Gershkovich for their dedication and
commitment to their community and their heritage; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause in its deliberations to pay
tribute to Drs. Tibor and Galina Gershkovich upon the occasion of  their
designation  as  Guests  of Honor at the 59th Anniversary Banquet of the
Flatbush Park Jewish Center on March 27, 2011; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Drs. Tibor and Galina Gershkovich.
